Jackie McSwiggan, recording secretary/golf chair of the Auxiliary, described the atmosphere as warm, welcoming and very relaxing. Many members of the Auxiliary, in addition to local businesses, donated baskets filled with treats for a silent auction. Hyper9 enables IT organizations to efficiently and effectively manage todays dynamic virtualized environment by providing visibility and control, all in an easy-to-navigate application. Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future, said Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer , in a statement. Satya Nadella replaces Microsoft veteran Bob Muglia as head of the highly profitable server business. Steve Ballmer took the unusual step in January of publicly announcing that he thought Muglia

A source told the Daily Mirror: Simon Cowell wants him and three beautiful girls on the panel. He will sit there like the cat that got the cream. Lindsay Lohan is notorious but she will give the show an edginess. ''There's been serious talks but Lindsay Lohan 's legal issues and her commitment to stay sober need to be worked through. She knows this could turn her life around. Cheryl Cole and Nicole Scherzinger are frontrunners for roles on the show when it launches in America later this year but Simon Cowell is still trying to decide on the perfect combination. for us.'' But scoring wasn't the first thing on Rasheed Wallace 's mind in the second half. He was more concerned with how the game was being officiated-- tipping toward the Spurs, he thought. Elgin Baylor knew what it was going to be out there, and Elgin Baylor didn't want our team to fall into that, Rasheed Wallace said. ''We knew how it was going to be, especially going against the league darlings.'' Rasheed Wallace finished with 19 points and Allen Iverson also scored 19 for Detroit Red ( 11-6), which has won

to a league-low 86.7. The Pistons obviously beat them on both ends of the court, with Los Angeles becoming the final NBA team to lose this season. ''We just played defense,'' Allen Iverson said. We made them take tough, contested shots. When they missed, we got out and ran and took advantage. On the offensive end, we just attacked all night. Kobe Bryant said the Pistons presented a ''matchup issue'' for the Lakers' defense.
